 2021-00432021-02-05,  ,  ,  ,  ,  NRCAN,  NEB
ActNational Energy Board Act
SubjectNOVA Gas Transmission Ltd. - 2021 NGTL Edson Mainline Expansion Project
PrecisOrder extending the time limit for the Governor Council decision with respect to the 2021 NGTL Edson Mainline Expansion Project proposed by NOVA Gas Transmission Ltd. to June 19, 2021.
